title: tAi shollum vArttaiyai
sahitya:
tAi shollum vArttaiyait-taTTAdu kELaDi sarasAngI manasE deivat-


anupallavi

  pEi koNDa kAmukhar pccinai eDukkAdE pEn eDukkum kurangait-tEniDam viDukkAdE


caraNam    Urai mayakkiDa uDalai minukkAdE ulaiyilE pOTTiDa valaiyilE piDikkAdE
mAraik-kuttiya pAlin mukham pOlat-tiriyAdE mOhamellAm shiva dAham adAkkuvAi
